body:
i'm thankful that right now the feels like temperature is -4, but when we get to las vegas tomorrow, the high will be 67.

i'm thankful for [this remix of passionfruit](https://open.spotify.com/track/7lW2HbFRh65PMz82J7mPnb) by yaeji.

i'm thankful for [this poem by louise glück](https://twitter.com/adam__clay/status/945849532864237569).

i'm thankful for _[shuffle drones](https://open.spotify.com/album/4tPXgZLAm906BUXtCwCkpX)_ by eluvium.

i'm thankful for [this photo of david bowie and brian eno](https://twitter.com/dark_shark/status/946159636452753414). i'm thankful for [these domestic tableaux](https://kotaku.com/the-adventures-of-bruce-lee-and-freddie-mercury-figures-1821619330) starring action figures of bruce lee and freddie mercury.

i'm thankful for [cy twombly's peonies](https://twitter.com/sanaa_mq/status/946006853447831552).

i'm thankful that there is still snow on the ground, though eventually it will melt.
normalized_markdown:
i'm thankful that right now the feels like temperature is -4, but when we get to las vegas tomorrow, the high will be 67.

i'm thankful for [this remix of passionfruit](https://open.spotify.com/track/7lW2HbFRh65PMz82J7mPnb) by yaeji.

i'm thankful for [this poem by louise glück](https://twitter.com/adam__clay/status/945849532864237569).

i'm thankful for _[shuffle drones](https://open.spotify.com/album/4tPXgZLAm906BUXtCwCkpX)_ by eluvium.

i'm thankful for [this photo of david bowie and brian eno](https://twitter.com/dark_shark/status/946159636452753414). i'm thankful for [these domestic tableaux](https://kotaku.com/the-adventures-of-bruce-lee-and-freddie-mercury-figures-1821619330) starring action figures of bruce lee and freddie mercury.

i'm thankful for [cy twombly's peonies](https://twitter.com/sanaa_mq/status/946006853447831552).

i'm thankful that there is still snow on the ground, though eventually it will melt.
